title: RIOT you have to Rework Lunar Goddess Diana IN GAME MODEL
body:
https://i.imgur.com/9csMBf5.jpg 
Since Lunar Ravel Is coming Can you guys Rework Lunar Goddess Diana IN GAME MODEL

cuz its kinda WELL................
https://imgur.com/I6M0TWM 
https://imgur.com/0khjKBi.png 
https://imgur.com/zhEM1jw.png 
https://imgur.com/KIswAJd.png

Was the the guy making the 3D Model Drunk or stoned or something??
https://imgur.com/45RwvWB.png

Dammit Riot Give the Goddess a proper IN GAME Skin and cut the B.S

It looks like its 240p resolution

Did some digging and also found out this
https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/4Y74y4q2-lunar-goddess-dianas-skin

REWORK THE IN GAME MODEL RIOT PLEASE AM BEGGING YOU
